tool_input.command:
git add -A && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
Add mobile support, auth, optimistic updates, and game state fixes

- Add password protection for game creation (auth token in cookies)
- Make board responsive with CSS scaling for mobile devices
- Prevent zoom and scroll issues on touch devices
- Add optimistic UI updates for stone placement
- Fix game state not updating when opponent joins
- Fix confusing UI when waiting for opponent
- Add CLAUDE.md with project documentation

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
